DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the safety and immunogenicity of a Group B Streptococcus vaccine.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Immunogenicity of a Group B Streptococcus Vaccine in Healthy Women
DOC.criteria: Healthy females 1840 years of age inclusive. Individuals who are pregnant or nursing. Individuals who have had a previous immunization with a vaccine containing streptococcus antigens or any vaccine within 30 days of enrollment through 30 days of study completion. Individuals with a history of severe allergic reactions after previous vaccination Individuals with designated blood tests that are not within normal range
